    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Muhlenberg Weekly &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guidedesc">
     Research guide for the digital version of The Muhlenberg Weekly student newspaper.
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Jan 5, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/muhlenbergweekly
     </span>

        RSS Updates
       </a>

      </li>

            </div>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18394406">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18394406">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18394406">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Navigation
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content18394406">
          <p>
           Issues of the
           <em>
            Muhlenberg Weekly
           </em>
           that contain historically interesting content are available by clicking these links, then advancing to the indicated pages.
          </p>
          <p>
           If you would like to suggest other significant dates to be added to this list, please contact
           <strong>
            sfalciani@muhlenberg.edu
           </strong>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt18394406" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18390670">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18390670">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18390670">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Significant Events
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18390670">
          <div id="boxatt18390670" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21703943">
              <a id="link_21703943" href="https://archive.org/details/mw1916-1917_muhl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21703943,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Muhlenberg Weekly', 'page_name' : 'Important Dates'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21703943}); ">
               Muhlenberg Suspends Athletics in Favor of Military Training (Vol. 35, 1916-17, p. 312)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The United States entered World War I in April 1917, and Muhlenberg responded immediately. During the ensuing years the College served as Student Army Training Corp camp.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21567532">
              <a id="link_21567532" href="https://archive.org/details/mw1941-1942_muhl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21567532,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Muhlenberg Weekly', 'page_name' : 'Important Dates'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21567532}); ">
               Eleanor Roosevelt Visits (Volume 60, 1941-42, pp. 96, 119)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               In May, 1942, First Lady Eleanor Roosevelt attended the bicentennial celebration of Henry Melchior Muhlenberg's arrival in America. A mere six months after the Pearl Harbor attack, the celebration included the dedication of the statue of General John Peter Muhlenberg, whose military service was used as inspiration for over 2000 Muhlenberg students and alumni who would serve in World War II.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21703506">
              <a id="link_21703506" href="https://archive.org/details/mw1946_muhl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21703506,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Muhlenberg Weekly', 'page_name' : 'Important Dates'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21703506}); ">
               Mules Place Fourth at Madison Square Garden (Volume 65, 1946, p. 10)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Muhlenberg exploded onto the national basketball scene in the mid-1940s by making three consecutive appearances in the National Invitation Tournament — at the time the biggest postseason college basketball tournament — at Madison Square Garden, finishing fourth in 1946. The Mules won four consecutive Middle Atlantic Conference North titles from 1946-50.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21703221">
              <a id="link_21703221" href="https://archive.org/details/mw1946-1947_muhl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21703221,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Muhlenberg Weekly', 'page_name' : 'Important Dates'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21703221}); ">
               Edward R. Murrow Speaks at Commencement (Volume 66, 1946-47, p.1)15.
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Journalist and war correspondent Edward R. Morrow speaks to the Class of 1947.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21567704">
              <a id="link_21567704" href="https://archive.org/details/mw1957-1958_muhl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21567704,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Muhlenberg Weekly', 'page_name' : 'Important Dates'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21567704}); ">
               Coeducation Begins (Volume 78, 1957-58 p.11)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               In the fall of 1957, Muhlenberg College admitted the first coeds.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21567761">
              <a id="link_21567761" href="https://archive.org/details/mw1963-1964_muhl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21567761,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Muhlenberg Weekly', 'page_name' : 'Important Dates'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21567761}); ">
               Kennedy Assassination (Volume 84, 1963-64 pp. 85, 86)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Editorials address the tragedy in Dallas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21574163">
              <a id="link_21574163" href="https://archive.org/details/mw1967-1968_muhl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21574163,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Muhlenberg Weekly', 'page_name' : 'Important Dates'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21574163}); ">
               LeRoi Jones Speaks at Muhlenberg (Volume 88, 1967-68, pp. 1, 4, 7, 11)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Poet and activist LeRoi Jones spoke at an assembly in early September, 1967, amid great controversy.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21573861">
              <a id="link_21573861" href="https://archive.org/details/mw2001-2002_muhl" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21573861,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Muhlenberg Weekly', 'page_name' : 'Important Dates'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21573861}); ">
               September 11th Attacks (Volume 120, 2001-02, pp. 1-4, 16-25)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               News coverage and editorial responses to the terror attacks of 9/11.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4960332" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>

       <div id="wrapbox18393253">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18393253">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18393253">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Muhlenberg Weekly (August 1944)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content18393253">
          <p>
           <img style="vertical-align: middle;" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/data/imagemanager/102691/war_headline.jpg" />
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt18393253" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
